p: Each time Zac hits an enemy with an ability, he sheds a chunk of himself that can be reabsorbed to restore Health. Upon taking fatal damage, Zac splits into 4 bloblets that attempt to recombine. If any bloblets remain, he will revive with an amount of Health depending on the Health of the surviving bloblets. Each bloblet has a percentage of Zac's maximum Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. This ability has a 5 minute cooldown.
q: Zac stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other.
w: Zac explodes outward towards nearby enemies, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage.
e: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.
r: Zac bounces four times, knocking up enemies hit and slowing them.
